title.rendered: What is QA documentation, and how to reduce its creation and maintenance costs?

yoast_head:

<title>QA Documentation: What Is It & Do You Always Need It? — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="QA documentation — i.e., a test plan, test cases, scripts, and bug reports —helps keep a QA team’s members on the same page, minimize bugs in software solutions, and speed up release cycles. Yet in some cases, you can make do without extensive quality assurance documentation to cut project costs." />

yoast_head_json.title: QA Documentation: What Is It & Do You Always Need It? — ITRex
yoast_head_json.description: QA documentation — i.e., a test plan, test cases, scripts, and bug reports —helps keep a QA team’s members on the same page, minimize bugs in software solutions, and speed up release cycles. Yet in some cases, you can make do without extensive quality assurance documentation to cut project costs.
